title: Prescription drugs; mail order opt out option
context: [§87A-16.3] Prescription drugs; mail order opt out option. A Hawaii employer-union health benefits trust fund health benefits plan shall permit each beneficiary to fill any covered prescription in accordance with chapter 431R. [L 2013, c 226, §3] Note Applicability of L 2013, c 226. L 2013, c 226, §§5, 8.
